skill.name: Crippling Wave
skill.description:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Unleash a series of large sweeping attacks that deal 155% weapon damage as Physical to all enemies in front of you.

Every third hit also dazes enemies within 11 yards, slowing their movement speed by 30% and attack speed by 20% for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Generate: 12 Spirit per attack

Sweeping punches that cripple enemies, reducing their attack and movement speed.

rune.name: Tsunami
rune.description:
Crippling Wave's third attack has its range increased to 17 yards and Freezes enemies for 1 second.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Crippling Wave's third attack has increased range and Freezes enemies.

Crippling Wave's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Exploding Palm
skill.description:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Cause an enemy to Bleed for 1200% weapon damage as Physical over 9 seconds. If the enemy dies while bleeding, it explodes and deals 2770% weapon damage as Physical damage to all nearby enemies.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 40 Spirit

Strike and Bleed an enemy. The enemy will explode if killed while bleeding.

rune.name: Impending Doom
rune.description: Exploding Palm no longer causes the enemy to bleed, but if the enemy dies while affected by Exploding Palm, they explode for 6305% weapon damage as Cold.
rune.simpleDescription: Exploding Palm no longer causes the enemy to bleed, but if the enemy dies while affected by Exploding Palm, they explode for massive Cold damage.

skill.name: Seven-Sided Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Dash rapidly between nearby enemies, dealing 5677% weapon damage over 7 strikes.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Move with blinding speed and strike nearby enemies while being immune to attacks yourself.

This ability does not start its cooldown until after its effects expire.

rune.name: Sustained Attack
rune.simpleDescription: Reduce the cooldown of Seven-Sided Strike.

skill.name: Dashing Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash up to 50 yards, striking enemies along the way for 370% weapon damage as Physical.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 1 Charge

Quickly dash and strike enemies.

You gain a charge every 8 seconds and can have up to 2 charges stored at a time.

rune.name: Blinding Speed
rune.description:
Gain 40% increased chance to Dodge for 4 seconds after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.
rune.simpleDescription:
Gain increased chance to Dodge after using Dashing Strike.

Dashing Strike's damage turns into Cold.

skill.name: Cyclone Strike
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Pull up to 16 enemies within 24 yards towards you, followed by a furious blast of energy that deals 261% weapon damage as Holy.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Mystical force pulls nearby enemies towards you and blasts them.

rune.name: Implosion
rune.description: Increase the distance enemies will be pulled towards you to 34 yards.
rune.simpleDescription: Increase the distance enemies will be pulled towards you.

skill.name: Mantra of Salvation
skill.description:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain an additional 20% increased resistance to all elements for 3 seconds.

Passive: You and your allies within 60 yards gain 20% increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cost: 50 Spirit

Active: You and nearby allies gain greatly increased resistance to all elements.

Passive: You and nearby allies gain increased resistance to all elements.

Only one Mantra may be active at a time.

rune.name: Perseverance
rune.description: Passive: Increases the resistance to all elements bonus to 40%.
rune.simpleDescription: Passive: Increases the resistance to all elements bonus.

skill.name: Seize the Initiative
skill.description: Dealing damage to enemies above 75% Life increases your attack speed by 30% for 4 seconds.
skill.flavor: The Monks of Ivgorod are trained to move like water — flowing freely into open spaces and crashing hard against their foes.

skill.name: Beacon of Ytar
skill.description: Reduce all cooldowns by 20%.
skill.flavor: It is only through hardship that we come to know our limits, and only through knowing our limits that we learn to shatter them.

skill.name: Harmony
skill.description: 40% of your single elemental resistances from items instead increases your resistance to all elements.
skill.flavor: Ice hunters brave months of frozen darkness. Desert traders bear relentless, scorching sun. This world is ours to endure.

skill.name: Sixth Sense
skill.description: Reduce all non-Physical damage taken by 25%.
skill.flavor: The final test of the Serpent's Form takes place in "The Pit of 12 Vipers." The initiates are not told about the 13th.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar for 193112 Life.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 30 seconds

Heals you and the Templar.

skill.name: Loyalty
skill.description: Regenerates 6437 Life per second for you and the Templar.
skill.simpleDescription: Provides Life regeneration for you and the Templar.

skill.name: Charge
skill.description:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges a target, dealing 280% weapon damage and stunning all enemies within 8 yards for 3 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 10 seconds

Charges an enemy, dealing damage and stunning nearby enemies.

skill.name: Inspire
skill.description:
Increases your resource generation.

Mana: 7 per second.
Hatred: 1 per second.
Wrath: 1.1 per second.
Arcane Power: 1.4 per second.
Fury: 10% generated.
Spirit: 10% generated.

skill.name: Crippling Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that deals 140% weapon damage and slows enemies hit by 80% for 4 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 4 seconds

Ranged attack that slows enemies.

skill.name: Dirty Fighting
skill.description:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 6 seconds

Blinds nearby enemies in front of the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Powered Shot
skill.description:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Ranged attack that explodes on impact, dealing 310% weapon damage as Arcane to enemies within 10 yards and has a 100% chance to Stun enemies for 2 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 8 seconds

Deals damage in an area that has a chance to Stun enemies.

skill.name: Anatomy
skill.description: Increases Critical Hit Chance by 1.8% for you and the Scoundrel.
skill.simpleDescription: Increases Critical Hit Chance for you and the Scoundrel.

skill.name: Charm
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Charms an enemy to fight for you for 8 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Temporarily Charms an enemy to fight for you.

skill.name: Missile Ward
skill.description: Buffs you and the Enchantress, reducing damage from ranged attacks by 6%.
skill.simpleDescription: Reduces damage from ranged attacks for you and the Enchantress.

skill.name: Erosion
skill.description:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals 330% weapon damage as Arcane over 5 seconds. Affected enemies will also take 3% increased damage.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 15 seconds

Conjures a pool of energy that deals damage and causes affected enemies to take additional damage.

skill.name: Mass Control
skill.description:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Lob a bulb of magical energy that hexes enemies in an area into chickens for 5 seconds.
skill.simpleDescription:
Cooldown: 18 seconds

Hexes a nearby group of enemies.
